full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 85 of 261 1246 LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross 1 correct? 2 A. Yes. 3 Q. And you testified earlier that the reason why you're not using your true name is to protect your child; correct? 4 5 A. Yes. 6 Q. You had a child at that point, didn't you? 7 A. Yes. 8 Q. And your lawyer also introduced you using your true name at that public hearing; correct? 9 10 A. Yes. 11 Q. And you were represented by a lawyer named Brad Edwards; correct? 12 13 A. Yes. 14 Q. And Mr. Edwards has represented you in connection with the claim that you made against the Epstein Victim Compensation Fund; correct? 15 16 17 A. Yes. 18 Q. In fact, Mr. Edwards was instrumental in setting up that fund, wasn't he? 19 20 A. I'm not sure. 21 Q. Is he here with you today? 22 A. Yes, he's here. 23 Q. He's in the courtroom; correct? 24 A. Um -- 25 Q. And you have consulted with him concerning your appearance SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012836
